Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its true worth, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for an exclusive price of $12000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing us to fairly compensate for our efforts and investment. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if there's any way we can make this arrangement more appealing to you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
